<template>
  <el-header height="64px">
    <el-container class="navbar-container">
      <el-aside width="64px">
        <el-image :src="brandIcon" class="brand-icon" fit="contain"></el-image>
      </el-aside>
      <el-main class="navbar-main">
        <el-space
          :direction="{ desktop: 'horizontal', mobile: 'vertical' }"
          split=""
          wrap
        >
          <el-text-item style="font-weight: bold">Home</el-text-item>
          <el-text-item>Portfolio</el-text-item>
          <el-text-item style="text-align: center; font-weight: bold">Riny Designs</el-text-item>
          <el-text-item>About me</el-text-item>
          <el-text-item>Contact</el-text-item>
        </el-space>
      </el-main>
    </el-container>
  </el-header>
</template>

<script>
import { ref } from 'vue';

export default {
  setup() {
    const activeIndex = ref('home');

    const handleSelect = (key) => {
      // Handle navigation or route changes based on selected item
      console.log(key);
    };

    return {
      activeIndex,
      handleSelect,
      brandIcon: 'path/to/your/brand/icon.png', // Replace with your brand icon path
    };
  },
};
</script>

<style scoped>
.navbar-container {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: space-between;
  width: 100%; /* Added to make navbar full width */
}

.brand-icon {
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
  cursor: pointer;
}

.navbar-menu {
  width: 100%;
  display: flex; /* Removed media query as it wasn't needed */
}

.center-item {
  text-align: center;
  font-weight: bold; /* Applied bold style directly */
}

.navbar-menu a { /* Added spacing between menu items */
  margin: 0 10px;
}

@media (max-width: 768px) {
  .navbar-menu {
    flex-direction: column;
  }

  .center-item {
    text-align: left !important; /* Override default alignment for mobile */
  }
}
</style>
